properties.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 10 at 4:04AM MST until February 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 15
inches.

* WHERE...Sangre De Cristo mountains and Wet Mountains.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.  The cold wind chills
as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if
precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MST TUESDAY
